CABuilder.author: Auto-answers | {{kanna}}
CABuilder.desc:
<:staff:868129884776587304> **Staff**: {{author}}
<:paper_patente:868126797034823780> **Server**: {{guild}}

Create your custom response/command.

Choose whether it will be a command (with prefix)
or if it will just be a normal word.

<:news:872891933712846908> **Sample prints below**:

step-1.desc:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **TRIGGER - STEP 1 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> Type in the chat what will be the trigger.

step-2.desc:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **CONTENT - STEP 2 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> About the answer, what's will have?
<:alvo:875481695170727997> __Trigger__: {{content}}

<:1P:864339513899876423> Text only
<:2P:864340907251859496> Image/Gif only
<:3P:864340907611127808> Text and Image/Gif
<:4P:864340906605019136> To react with a emoji

1.desc:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **ANSWER - STEP 3 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> When someone types '{{content}}' in the chat
what should i answer? Submit the word/phrase below.

2.desc:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **ANSWER - STEP 3 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> When someone types '{{content}}' in the chat
which image/gif should i send? Submit below.

3.desc2-5:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **ANSWER - STEP 2.5 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> When someone types '{{content}}' in the chat
what will be the title (text) of the Image/Gif? Submit below.
3.desc3:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **ANSWER - STEP 3 OF 3**

<a:check:918935548901617684> When someone types '{{content}}' in the chat
which image/gif should i send? Submit below.

Text defined for image title: {{content2}}

You can attach the image/gif or send its link.
3.okay:
Okay!
If someone types {{content}} in the chat I will respond with **{{content2}} ({{content3}})**!

To configure your custom responses, use: **{{prefix}}ca**

4.desc:
<:authorized:868333235116056586> **ANSWER - STEP 3 OF 3**

what should i answer? Submit the word/phrase below.
